Electrical Health Checks

Ensure the safety, efficiency, and reliability of your electrical systems with Shaffer Construction, Inc.'s comprehensive electrical health checks. Our expert technicians provide thorough inspections tailored for both residential and commercial properties in Los Angeles and Southern California.

Why Schedule an Electrical Health Check?

  • Detect potential electrical hazards before they cause damage or safety issues.
  • Improve energy efficiency and reduce utility costs.
  • Ensure compliance with safety standards and codes.
  • Extend the lifespan of your electrical infrastructure.
  • Peace of mind knowing your electrical system is in top condition.

What Our Electrical Health Check Includes

Our thorough assessment covers:

  • Inspection of wiring integrity and connections
  • Evaluation of circuit breakers and panels
  • Assessment of grounding and building wiring safety
  • Testing of electrical outlets and switches for proper operation
  • Energy efficiency analysis and recommendations

If we identify issues, we provide custom solutions to optimize safety and performance, including upgrades and repairs as needed.
